name: SIDE YOU'RE ON
description:
SIDE YOU'RE ON is a rhythm hidden object game played with only the left and right arrow keys.

Simply select a save slot from the menu, start playing your music and use the in-game timer to match the bpm, then play for as long as you like and hit left and right at the same time to save your song and best score.

You can hold P + L to change tempo rapidly or press O+K to fine-tune it, F5 will start a new beat on your press (for when you get out of sync)
